app.title: COVID-19
login.goToSignUp: You do not have account, create one!
login.title: Login
onboarding.description.1: Through a few simple questions and a x-ray photo we are able to identify if you have COVID-19 symptoms
onboarding.description.2: With the information completed and the x-ray photos we are able strongly helpin a faster way to detect cases
onboarding.description.3: Governments are able to use the data to act faster and prevent the collapse of the medical system
onboarding.error.pageNotExist: Error: Onboarding page number doesn't exist
patientQuizLaunch.title: Not feeling good :(
patientQuizLaunch.description.1: In order to detect if you have symptoms that may correspond to the COVID-19 we ask you to complete a short questionnaire.
patientQuizLaunch.description.2: In case you have risky symptoms, We will guide you on how to act.
patientQuizLaunch.hint: Don’t worry, all the information provided is 100% anonymous
patent.quiz.1: Do you have severe difficult breathing?
patent.quiz.2: Are you having a very hard time waking up?
patent.quiz.5: Are you experiencing severe chest pain?
patent.quiz.6: Do you have shortness of breath while at rest?
patent.quiz.7: Do you have inability to lie down because of difficulty breathing?
patent.quiz.8: Chronic health conditions that you are having difficulty managing because of difficulty breathing?
patent.quiz.10: Do you have cough or sore throat?
patent.quiz.11: Have you traveled outside your country on the last 14 days?
patent.quiz.12: Did you provide care or have
patent.quiz.12.2: with a person with COVID-19 (probable or confirmed) while they were ill (cough, fever, sneezing, or sore throat)?
patent.quiz.13.2: with a person who travelled outside your country in the last 14 days who has become ill (cough, fever, sneezing, or sore throat)?
patientRiskConfirmed.message: Please call emergency or go directly to your nearest emergency department
patientRiskConfirmedXRay.message.1: This app has been created with the objective of giving the medical community a tool to collect chest X-Ray of people suspected and diagnosed of having COVID-19.
patientRiskConfirmedXRay.message.2: By no means this is a self-diagnose tool.
patientRiskConfirmedXRay.message.3: The data collected will help to analyze and understand how the COVID-19 behave and how it can be better diagnosed on early stages.
wohoo.title: Wohoooo, that’s a good news!
wohoo.text.2: In order to help us creating an algorithm very effective that helps people to truly auto-diagnostic the COVID 19 is very important that if you have a chest x-ray help us uploading a picture of it
age.question: Are you 18 years old?
age.underAge: We sorry but for legacy issues only people older than 18 are able to use the platform
home.selectPatientDoctor: Select if you are a patient or doctor
home.bodyDoctor.note: *Creating a big data base of x-ray images will help to train our Artificial Intelligence algorithm in order to be able to detect if the patient has strongly chances of having the COVID-19 virus, creating an truly auto-diagnostic App
howDoYouFeel.title: How do you feel today?
webHome.title: Help us fight COVID-19
webHome.description1: We are a group of professionals volunteering to create an AI that will help hospitals and doctors all around the world to diagnose COVID-19 faster with X-Ray scans.
webHome.description2: Right now {important1} to get all the information available, if you are a doctor that has X-Rays of diagnosed patients or a patient with X-Rays of the past 14 days we need you! {important2} your data to be able to feed our AI with the correct information.
webHome.description3: All your data will be used as an anonymous input.
webHome.subTitle: How do we help in the fight against COVID-19?
webHome.howToHelp1.title: Identify COVID-19 symptoms
webHome.howToHelp1.description: Through a few simple questions and an x-ray photo we are able to identify if you are in risk of having COVID-19
webHome.howToHelp2.title: Improve real time diagnostics
webHome.howToHelp2.description: With the information completed and the x-ray photos we are able to find a faster way to detect cases
webHome.howToHelp3.title: Help governments
webHome.howToHelp3.description: Governments and hospitals are able to use the data to act faster and prevent the collapse of the medical system
